home.description: My name is Pedro, I'm a developer with more than 2 years of experience  building  for the web.
home.skills-text: Using the latest tech this world has to offer

experiences.dialog-text-1: I studied hardware for 2 years and then I started working building PC's and doing maintenance
experiences.dialog-text-2: This is where I started to change careers, but I continued working with computers, I studied for 2 years before starting to work as a developer.
experiences.dialog-text-3: Now. I work as a freelancer doing different types of work like complete websites and apps using all the technologies alongside

project.subtitle: Here is my latest project and some information about it
project.info-text-1: Next.js e-commerce project is built using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Redux, and Tailwind CSS. It features a dynamic product catalog fetched from an API, with functionalities like filtering based on categories, brands, and prices. The Redux store manages the global state, ensuring seamless updates across components.
project.info-text-2: Tailwind CSS is used for responsive, modern UI design. The app includes pages for product listings, detailed product views, shopping cart, and checkout, with real-time updates and optimized performance for a smooth user experience across devices.
project.info-text-3: The Next.js showcase project uses React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It features a dynamic phone catalog, including iPhone 15 and RedMagic 9 Pro. Showcase pages highlight these phones' unique features with animations created using Framer Motion. The Redux store efficiently manages global state, ensuring real-time updates with filtering options for brand, specs, and price.
project.info-text-4: Tailwind CSS ensures a modern, responsive UI design across devices. The app includes pages for phone listings, detailed views, shopping cart, and checkout, all optimized for performance. Framer Motion provides visually appealing interactions, enhancing the shopping experience.
